testsuite.name: ScheduleGenerationService Tests

testcase.name: Should minimize duplicate pairings across rounds
Should validate: throw exception with less than 4 players
Should validate: throw exception with empty player list
Should select exactly 4 players per round
Should handle large number of rounds
Should generate valid schedule for minimum viable size
Should generate plan with all rounds having unique round numbers
Should be consistent with same seed (if seeding is used)
Should validate: throw exception with duplicate player names
Should validate: throw exception with 0 rounds
Should generate schedule with all 10 players
Should generate schedule with correct number of rounds
Should generate plan with unique ID
